description: Try this frozen yoghurt slice with blueberry and almonds for a healthier afternoon treat. It's the perfect summer dessert recipe.
name: Blueberry & Almond Frozen Yoghurt Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine yoghurt, honey and vanilla in a large bowl, then pour into pan. Dollop over spoonfuls of blueberries. Gently shake pan to smooth top, then freeze for 5 hours or until frozen. Stand at room temperature for 10 minutes, then slice and serve topped with almonds.
